wikipedia.title: The Coasters
wikipedia.extract: The Coasters are an American rhythm and blues/rock and roll vocal group who had a string of hits in the late 1950s. Beginning with "Searchin'" and "Young Blood", their most memorable songs were written by the songwriting and producing team of Leiber and Stoller. Although the Coasters originated outside of mainstream doo-wop, their records were so frequently imitated that they became an important part of the doo-wop legacy through the 1960s.

opinions.details: 不清楚。 The Coasters 也感觉像是说 住在海边的人，黑哥很多来自中美洲各种岛国。
